info.description: Fosscord is a free open source selfhostable discord compatible chat, voice and video platform
info.title: Fosscord HTTP API Routes

X-RateLimit-Bucket.description: A unique string denoting the rate limit being encountered (non-inclusive of major parameters in the route path)

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: Date when current period is over in seconds since the Unix epoch

X-Rate-Limit-Reset-After.description: Number of seconds when current period will reset (can have decimal)

Retry-After.description: Same as X-Rate-Limit-Reset-After but an integer

X-RateLimit-Global.description: Indicates whether or not all requests from your ip are rate limited
